## Purpose

This runbook is an interactive control panel for the project. It demonstrates:
- ingestion of heterogeneous datasets
- automated documentation generation (data catalog)
- reproducible execution via shared scripts

## Load project code

```{r}
source("R/utilities.R")
check_prereqs()
load_pkgs()

source("R/01_ingest.R")
source("R/03_document.R")

## Validate Against Contracts

```

validated <- validate_all(ingested, contracts_dir = "contracts")
summary <- write_validation_summary(validated, "output/validation/validation_summary.csv")
summary
